title: The readers doth protest too much, methinks
body: As I read through the comments of yesterday's post, it became painfully obvious that a little clarification was needed. As it turns out, the pain was coming from a paper clip that I accidentally sat on last Thursday. Still, it was obvious that the post needed some explaining. First, the shirts in question are for blog readers only. They will only be offered once, and once they're gone... they're gone. Another Moxie shirt will be available to the general public, but it won't be the one you voted on. I hope that makes things a bit more clear. Now, seeing as the battle lines have already been drawn between the design #1 camp and the design #2 camp, it's time to put your money where your mouth is. Literally. The base cost for a shirt is $10.00, and it breaks down like this: A hip / hop / a hippa to the hippa to the hip hip hop and you don't stop! Shirt = $5.00 Shipping = $3.00 PayPal Fees = $0.59 Packing = $1.50 The shirt will be available in four price ranges, each one with it's own level of Moxie involvement: Acquaintances of The Moxie: $12.00 (Shirt + $2.00 donation) You get: The shirt and 1 limited edition Moxie button Friends of The Moxie: $15.00 (Shirt + $5.00 donation) You get: The shirt and 2 limited edition Moxie buttons REALLY Good Friends of The Moxie: $20.00 (Shirt + $10.00 donation) You get: The shirt, 2 limited edition Moxie buttons, and a very special Moxie bumper sticker Married to The Moxie: $25.00 (Shirt + $20.00 donation) You get: The shirt, all 3 limited edition Moxie buttons, a very special Moxie bumper sticker, and a little something extra *NOTE: When I say BUTTON(S) I'm refering to the cool kind that you pin on your jacket, bag, or pants - not the ones you sew on your shirt. Of course, if you'd rather have a regular GENERAL PUBLIC Moxie shirt, those will be available shortly. Now, so I can get an idea of what the TRUE demand for the limited edition blog shirt will be, please tell me which design you would buy. You don't have to say at which level you'd buy, but for those of you who are seriously considering buying one (thanks!), I need to know how many to order... and at what size. Don't be ashamed if you need an x-large or a small size. If it makes you feel any better, I still wear small... underwear. Oh (said in a sad tone). Better yet, if you want a limited edition blog shirt, e-mail me at: << the.moxie AT gmail DOT com >> with the following: 1. The design you want (#1 or #2) 2. The size you need (S/M/L/XL) 3. A haiku and/or limerick The design that gets the most pre-orders wins. Simple as that. The limited edition buttons and sticker(s) will be showing up sometime tonight or tomorrow. The "Shop Moxie" link will be replaced with something like... "Moxie Store" or "Moxie Crap" or "Fuckin' Moxie!" or something like that. Click it and you will see the OFFICIAL Moxie shirt (for the general public), the limited edition pins, and the sticker(s). Pre-orders will begin now and stop around noonish CST on Friday. Tomorrow's post will be a REAL Moxie-related post about all the stuff that's been happening while you were diverted by this crazy T-Shirt business. Friday's post will announce the winner of the limited edition blog shirt, and then THAT'S IT! No more shirt talk. All Moxie, all the time! Seriously.
author: Dan
